task.summary: Default task
Improved copying of addresses in UI
Added error message for not having web3
Address is now "Not available" if web3 isn't present
Fixed #20. Did not fix Owen's code.
Fixed #40
Changed "Transfer Kairo" to "Send Kairo"
Enabled Kairo transfer during all phases
Removed deposit amount checker
Fixed #41, updated open zeppelin libraries
Updated ABI files used in UI
Updated the UI to be compatible with new contract.
Debugged UI
Updated incentive model. Fixed #42, fixed #43, fixed #38.
Fixed #31, fixed #39
Added emergency withdraw to UI, started improving emergency handling in contract.
Fixed proposal investment calculation in UI.
Updated comments in betoken.coffee
Improved upgrading process of contracts
Added Metamask link in web3 not found message
Changed Kairo redistribution model after cycle end, such that reward is related to token price performance.
Fixed #44. Added stake amount in Kairo in proposals tab.
Implemented #45
Optimized new code a bit
Added corresponding features in the UI. Debugged contracts.
npm fix
Added error checkers in UI for creating more than maxProposalsPerMember proposals and for staking on both sides of a proposal. Updated expected commission formula.
Added script for automating upgrading contracts.
Refactored 2_deploy_contracts.js to coffeescript. Added whenPaused modifier for changing owner and address of ControlToken and OraclizeHandler contracts.
Refactored 2_deploy_contracts.js to coffeescript. Added whenPaused modifier for changing owner and address of ControlToken and OraclizeHandler contracts.
Completed emergency functions in BetokenFund
Changed auto-stake to burn, made topbar shorter, moved contract addresses to "info" modal.
Improved mobile support
Linked contract addresses to etherscan, added oraclize address
Fixed bug in burning Kairo, added error message for exceeding maxProposals, changed to new contract. Added favicon.
Fixed bug in initializeParticipants() where isparticipant isn't updated.
Added cycle number field in constructor
Added allowEmergencyWithdraw indicator in UI
added code for removing duplicates in participants in upgrade script
roughly implemented BetokenFund contract with whitelisted proposals only.
reverted to before implementing token whitelist
Made proposal execution more scalable
partially updated UI, fixed bug in contract
removed most proposal-based loops in contract
partially finished UI
finished disable handler for proposal execution button in UI
fixed bugs in contract, updated abi in ui
merged changemakingtime and proposalmakingtime
preliminary implementation of scalable version
